messages.subject: Re: verbs (ROFLOL)
messages.msgSnippet: Erica made a shopping list today.  She wrote noodles, not cupped . I know she means ramen noodles in a package and not a cup, but it was funny. Crystal ...
messages.messageBody:
Erica made a shopping list today. She wrote "noodles, not cupped".
I know she means ramen noodles in a package and not a cup, but it was
funny.

Crystal
